title: kusumAkara vimAnArUDhAm
sahitya:
kusumAkara vimAnArUDhAm kunda mukuLa radanAm vandEham


anupallavi

 bhAsamAna kAmEshvarAnandAm bhakta janAdi mangalapradAm 
vasukONa dashAra pIThasthitAm vArija lOcanAm paradEvatAm


caraNam   vAsudEvanuta vIthiviTankAm vANIsha vandita varashAkAm 
vAsavAdi guruguha santOSAm vicitra vIthipravEsha vEsham
